Class Library

java.lang.Object
com.library.Library
public class Library extends Object
Core service handling books, users, holds, and loans.

    • removeBook

      public Book removeBook(String bookId)
      Removes a book from the catalog.
      Parameters:
      bookId - unique ID of the book
      Returns:
      the removed Book, or null if none existed

    • searchBooks

      public List<Book> searchBooks(String keyword)
      Searches books by title, author, or ID.
      Parameters:
      keyword - search term
      Returns:
      matching list of books

    • listBooks

      public Collection<Book> listBooks()
      Returns:
      all books in the catalog

      Parameters:
      l - the Librarian to add

    • listUsers

      public Collection<Person> listUsers()
      Returns:
      all registered users (borrowers + librarians)

    • placeHold

      public boolean placeHold(String borrowerId, String bookId)
      Places a hold request for a borrowed book.
      Parameters:
      borrowerId - ID of the borrower
      bookId - ID of the book
      Returns:
      true if the hold was placed

    • getHoldsForBook

      public List<HoldRequest> getHoldsForBook(String bookId)
      Parameters:
      bookId - ID of the book
      Returns:
      list of hold requests for that book

    • issueBook

      public boolean issueBook(String borrowerId, String bookId, String librarianId)
      Issues a book to a borrower, if valid.
      Parameters:
      borrowerId - ID of the borrower
      bookId - ID of the book
      librarianId - ID of the librarian processing
      Returns:
      true if issued successfully

    • returnBook

      public boolean returnBook(String bookId)
      Processes return of a book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - ID of the book
      Returns:
      true if returned successfully

    • renewLoan

      public boolean renewLoan(String borrowerId, String bookId)
      Renews an existing loan.
      Parameters:
      borrowerId - ID of the borrower
      bookId - ID of the book
      Returns:
      true if renewed

    • displayOverdue

      public List<Loan> displayOverdue()
      Returns:
      list of currently overdue loans

    • generateUserReport

      public List<Loan> generateUserReport(String borrowerId)
      Parameters:
      borrowerId - ID of the borrower
      Returns:
      all loans (active and past) for that borrower

    • getBook

      public Book getBook(String bookId)
      Look up a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - the book's unique identifier
      Returns:
      the Book from the catalog, or null if not found
